languages.english-overview:
Collabtive is web-based project management software.
Collabtive is intended for small to medium-sized businesses and freelancers.
Collabtive is cloud based groupware easy and efficient for your projects.
Collabtive is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.

ul.li: Unlimited projects, milestones, tasklists, and tasks
Timetracker reports, activity logs and messages in PDF format
RSS feeds for messages and tasks
Synchronization of calendars via iCal task export
Excel files from activity logs and timetracker reports

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
